Blog.post: Skool reopen liao and i never thought of changing so many new teachers....our literture change to tat da Ms teo....first dae i c her not happi liao....next iz da chinese cher ...mdm yuan didnt change but go bacchina look after her son as sick...nvm....maths leh...shiok!change tym table liao and tuesdae no mathz and WEdnesdae gt 3 periods of mathz....so next tym cher didt come hoh then got privillage liao....ani wae mdm ng go bac da malaysia as her father pass awae...i think so ...so sad....waaaa....condolence...so i gt 3 free period and stay in tat dumb hall for 1 and 1/2hour....later still gt assembly...yayayaaya so sian.....aniwae i hoh ....ai yoo...nvm...thats end...see ya...

wow....camp iz nice ......fun realli ...i am not lying....i realli meet lots of seniors and i feel the frenz in choir i met this year iz realli nice frenz to mi....ai yo...like tt Anthea lor...alwaes speak englizh and say thingz tt are so chim....Jia min leh?....She veri good oso.....nice to tok to...oso the frenz i met las tym...now i noe them better...for example...Cecilia,grace,xue qi...seniors?....like Xinyi(cindy),chee geok,geneviene.....lots but the best of all iz tt i like choir more i never choir can be tt fun....hahahaaaaa...

hmm.....todae morning....i found my new interest....it iz ....skipping.....haizzz....but since afternoon i hate it....i really hate it....lol....then gt la Vista......my class dance loh....then of course yew zhen gt dance coz she beri good at it.....then even people sitting at the foyer praise her....waaa....famous liao lor....haizzz....so 'sian mu'...she not like mi....so pretty..and so talented...haizzz....mi leh....shit compare to mi....shit iz gold....haizzz.....nvm.....oso todae...start to look after an 'egg-bert'...so lame and nert....i noe iz damn idiotic.....but no choice.....now i began to hate everything.....its ridiculas.....and i cant stand most of the things around mi.....yy?wad happened?i am realli confused...juz hope tt i does not exsist.....so....haizzz

haizzz....again another boring dae.....but happili national dae iz coming and gt so many dae of break....heeee.....no need go school sae....no need see someone.....haizzzz....dun noe y leh.....juz it seems it iz a big stone in my heart.....cannot get rid of it......lol...so dramatic....haaa....todae i gt a SURPrise...(no lar should be SHOCK)test by tt Mr Chua lor....he hah....sAe iz on thursdae but becom todae.....lol...he alwaes like tt one....haizzz....make everyone so worried....ha...when started test hah....a lot people so scared tt broke a lot of apparatus.......too bad....then waa lao....i oso beri angry leh....the teacher damn idiotic leh....call so many tyms oso didnt come one....JUMP here JUMp there oso no use .....waaa lao...haizzz suddenli i feel tt i am like MEI FEN(those in 6c one will noe)...haizzz....then i thought tt iz sitwif my frenz one but instead iz do individualy one...coz i beri dependent on my frenz for experiment...poor yew zhen dun have a place....have to sit on another bench tt no one ever sit one.....i leh.....sit wif the idex 39 one lor.....(jason )lor.....during the test i tok to him....(shhhh.....)look at each other experiment.....waa lao...dun think wrongly ...we didnt copy answer....and nothing between us hah...then alwaes i dun dare to lit the bunsen burner but becoz i damn angry wif tt idiotic teacher tt i lit the bunsen burner of the teacher angriliiiii!haaa.....then experiment okok lar.....but still dun noe how to do...haaa....end here lar...dun wanna tok so muc liao
